biotools.summary: CoCAS is a standalone Chromatin immunoprecipitation microarray (ChIP-on-chip) analysis application. It has been designed to be used primarily on Agilent microarrays scanned with an Agilent scanner.

bioschemas.name: COCAS
bioschemas.summary: CoCAS is a standalone Chromatin immunoprecipitation microarray (ChIP-on-chip) analysis application. It has been designed to be used primarily on Agilent microarrays scanned with an Agilent scanner.
